Public MustInherit Class WizardStepBase Inherits View

summary.span: 实现 控件中一个步骤所需的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality required by a step in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不能直接创建的实例类。You cannot directly create an instance of the class. 相反，由继承此类类和类提供用作向导的控件中的一个步骤的基本功能。Instead, this class is inherited by the class and the class to provide the basic functionality of a step in a control that acts as a wizard. 可以从派生类，以创建一个自定义类，表示向导控件中的唯一步骤。You can derive from the class to create a custom class that represents a unique step in a wizard control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许用户从 集合中后面的步骤返回当前步骤。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to return to the current step from a subsequent step in a collection.

value.span: 如果允许用户返回当前步骤，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user is allowed to return to the current step; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于强制实施中的线性导航控件。The property can be used to enforce linear navigation in a control. 如果每个步骤都具有其属性设置为`false`，用户将无法再被访问后返回到的步骤。If each step has its property set to `false`, the user will not be able to return to a step after it has been accessed. 您可能需要使用此功能的一种方案是不允许用户返回到的步骤，因为您是将数据保存到数据库的每个步骤已完成后完成。One scenario where you might use this functionality is to disallow a user to return to a step after it has been completed because you are persisting the data to a database as each step is completed. 如果将数据保存在每个步骤后，允许用户返回到的步骤和后已保存更改的信息已保存的数据可能会损坏。If you save the data after each step and allow the user to return to a step and change information after it has been saved, the saved data might become corrupted. 通过设置属性设置为`false`，一旦用户已离开一个步骤，他或她将不能返回到它并更改任何值。By setting the property to `false`, once the user has left a step, he or she will not be able to return to it and change any values. 属性确定如何以及何时**上一步**不呈现。The property determines how and when the **Previous** button is not rendered. 下表描述了**上一步**按钮呈现行为。The following table describes the **Previous** button rendering behavior. |方案Scenario|行为Behavior| |--------------|--------------| |线性： 步骤 1 已设置为`false`和用户执行任何操作将转到步骤 2。Linear: Step1 has set to `false` and user action goes to step 2.|步骤 2 不会显示**上一步**按钮。Step 2 does not display the **Previous** button.| |非线性： 步骤 1 已设置为`false`和用户执行任何操作将转到步骤 3。Non-Linear: Step1 has set to `false` and user action goes to step 3.|步骤 3 不会显示**上一步**按钮。Step 3 does not display the **Previous** button.| |侧栏按钮： 步骤 2 具有设置为`false`，设置为`true`，并且用户单击侧栏按钮。SideBar Buttons: Step 2 has set to `false` , is set to `true`, and a user clicks on the SideBar button.|没有按钮将被自动禁用侧栏上时设置为`false`。No buttons are automatically disabled on the sidebar when is set to `false`. 如果用户单击按钮时，则忽略该操作。If a user clicks the button, the action is ignored.| |线性和非线性带有自定义模板： 在步骤提供了一个自定义导航模板。Linear & Non-Linear with Custom Template: The step has a custom navigation template.|无自动隐藏或显示会发生设置为`false`使用一个模板来导航。No automatic hiding or displaying occurs if is set to `false` when you use a template for navigation. **上一步**按钮应当是可选的模板。The **Previous** button should be optional on the template.| |使用 Visual Studio 设计器和： 在控件有 5 个步骤，你正在在步骤 4 中，并且运行该页面。Using the Visual Studio Designer and : The control has 5 steps, you are working on step 4, and you run the page.|步骤 4 时，则**上一步**呈现按钮。When step 4 is the , then the **Previous** button is rendered. **上一步**按钮仅对隐藏设置为当上一步的历史记录中具有设置为`false`。The **Previous** button is only hidden for set to when the preceding step in the history has set to `false`. 因为首先呈现步骤 4 和历史记录中，没有步骤**上一步**按钮不会隐藏。Since step 4 is rendered first and there are no steps in the history, the **Previous** button is not hidden.| |开始步骤和非线性导航： 用户访问步骤 3 和步骤 4 和步骤 1 已设置为。Start Step and Non-Linear Navigation: A user visits step 3 and step 4 and then step 1 which has set to .|该向导不会添加**上一步**按钮时设置为而不考虑用户如何导航到该步骤。The wizard does not add a **Previous** button when the is set to regardless of how the user navigates to that step.| |历史记录中的相同步骤： 用户访问第 3 步其中设置为和用户不会提交它们的操作。Same Step In History: A user visits step 3 where is set to and the user does not commit their actions. 然后单击在步骤 3 上的上一个按钮。They then click on the previous button on step 3.|向导控件将检查以查看是否**上一步**历史记录中的步骤是用户当前正在"相同"步骤。The wizard control checks to see if the **Previous** step in the history is the "same" step that the user is currently on. 如果在步骤是相同的向导控件回顾历史记录以确定前面的"其他"步骤中和基的显示**上一步**按钮和目标基于"不同步骤"历史记录中。If the step is the same, the wizard control looks back in the history to determine the preceding "different" step and bases the display of the **Previous** button and destination based on the "different step" in the history.| > [!NOTE] > 当属性设置为`false`，但属性的父控件设置为`true`上侧栏区域中的按钮, 不起作用。When the property is set to `false`, but the property of the parent control of is set to `true`, clicking on a button in the sidebar area has no effect. 侧栏区域通常显示提供非线性导航栏中，因此如果您不使用非线性导航的功能，您可能需要设置属性设置为`false`。The sidebar area is generally displayed to provide nonlinear navigation, so if you are not using the functionality of nonlinear navigation, you may want to set the property to `false`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用属性来阻止用户返回到另一个步骤后访问它进行控制。The following example demonstrates using the property to stop the user from returning to a step in the control after it has been accessed. 在示例中，`Step1`的步骤都有其属性设置为`false`。In the example, the `Step1` step has its property set to `false`. 以用户离开`Step1`步骤中，没有上一步按钮显示在`Step2`步骤。After the user leaves the `Step1` step, no Previous button appears on the `Step2` step. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn/CS/wizardstepbaseallowreturncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseAllowReturn/VB/wizardstepbaseallowreturnvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示主题是否应用于该控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.

value.span: 如果使用主题，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use themes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为启用主题控件。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control. 属性还会影响是否为自己的控件集合中包含的控件启用主题。The property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its controls collection. 当属性是`true`，应用程序的主题目录搜索的控件外观应用。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果在主题目录中存在用于特定控件，则不会应用外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied. 当属性是`false`，则不会搜索在主题目录和的值不使用属性。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the value of the property is not used. 控件可以重写值集，由其父控件或包含页。A control can override the value set by its parent control or by the containing page. 例如，如果控件具有设置为`false`，您可以有选择地应用到通过设置向导步骤中所包含的子控件的主题属性设置为`true`上各个子控件。For example, if a control has set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the wizard step by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls.

related.span: 向导 Web 服务器控件

summary.span: 获取或设置分配给服务器控件的编程标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier assigned to the server control.

value.span: 分配给控件的编程标识符。

span.span: The programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以确定并引用特定的向导步骤控件在 Web 窗体页中。Use the property to identify and reference a particular wizard step control in a Web Forms page. 值将成为在页中的控件实例的名称; 这使您可以轻松地访问该页面的代码中的特定步骤。The value becomes the name of the control instance in the page; this allows you to easily access a particular step in code for that page. 例如，如果您设置的属性控制到"步骤 1"，可以引用作为该页面的代码中的向导步骤的子控件`Step1.Controls`。For example, if you set the property of a control to "Step1", you can reference the child controls of the wizard step in code for that page as `Step1.Controls`. 控件可确保在每个步骤控件时的步骤中添加或修改在设计时具有有效的唯一标识符。The control ensures that each step in a control has a valid unique identifier when steps are added or modified at design time. 例如，设置它不能与另一个步骤中包含的标识符匹配用于在设计时的步骤，请控件使用，而且不能匹配包含控件。For example, when you set the for a step at design time, it cannot match the identifier for another step contained in the control, and it cannot match the for the containing control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了三个向导步骤Web 窗体页中的控件。The following code example defines three wizard steps for a control in a Web Forms page. 在代码页中，向导步骤实例已由其 ID 值，命名，并且可以在代码中引用它们`WizardStep1`， `WizardStep2`，和`WizardStep3`。In code for the page, the wizard step instances are named by their ID values, and they can be referenced in the code as `WizardStep1`, `WizardStep2`, and `WizardStep3`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep/CS/wizardactivestepcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardActiveStep/VB/wizardactivestepvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 此属性在设计时设置为无效的标识符字符串。

span.span: The property was set to an invalid identifier string at design time.
-or-

exception.span: 此属性在设计时设置为与包含 控件相同的标识符。

span.span: The property was set to the same identifier as the containing control at design time.
-or-

exception.span: 此属性在设计时设置为与包含 控件中的另一个步骤相同的标识符。

span.span: The property was set to the same identifier as another step in the containing control at design time.

summary.span: 获取与用作向导的控件中的某个步骤关联的名称。

span.span: Gets the name associated with a step in a control that acts as a wizard.

value.span: 与用作向导的控件中的某个步骤关联的名称。

span.span: The name associated with a step in a control that acts as a wizard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回一个字符串，标识的向导控件中的步骤。The property returns a string that identifies a step in a wizard control. 如果为指定值属性，属性返回该值。If a value is specified for the property, the property returns that value. 如果为不指定任何值属性，属性返回的值属性。If no value is specified for the property, the property returns the value of the property. 如果没有为指定的值或属性，属性返回`null`。If values are not specified for either the or the property, the property returns `null`.

Public Overridable Property StepType As WizardStepType

member this.StepType : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要为 控件中某个步骤显示的导航用户界面 (UI) 的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of navigation user interface (UI) to display for a step in a control.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要显示有关中的一个步骤的导航按钮的类型控件。Use the property to specify the type of navigation buttons to display for a step in a control. 指定此属性的值，如果任何步骤标记为处于禁用状态的侧栏中显示。If you specify a value for this property, any steps marked as displays in a disabled state in the sidebar. 如果不指定此属性的值，默认值是`WizardStepType.Auto`。If you do not specify a value for this property, the default is `WizardStepType.Auto`. 下表列出的可用设置属性和步骤的结果行为：The following table lists the available settings for the property and the resulting behavior of the step: `WizardStepType.Auto` 为该步骤呈现的 UI 的导航取决于在其中声明该步骤的顺序。The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared. `WizardStepType.Complete` 该步骤是要显示的最后一个步骤。The step is the last one to appear. 不呈现任何导航按钮。No navigation buttons are rendered. `WizardStepType.Finish` 该步骤是最终数据收集步骤。The step is the final data collection step. 呈现用于导航的完成和上一步按钮。The Finish and Previous buttons are rendered for navigation. `WizardStepType.Start` 该步骤是要显示的第一个步骤。The step is the first one to appear. 不呈现上一步按钮。A Previous button is not rendered. `WizardStepType.Step` 该步骤是开始日期和完成步骤之间的任何步骤。The step is any step between the Start and the Finish step. 呈现用于导航的上一步和下一步按钮。Previous and Next buttons are rendered for navigation. 此步骤类型对于重写 步骤类型非常有用。This step type is useful for overriding the step type.

exception.span: 所选的值不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The selected value is not one of the enumeration values.

related.span: 向导 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Wizard Web Server Control

summary.span: 获取或设置在启用侧栏功能时，要用于 控件中某个步骤的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title to use for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled.

value.span: 在启用侧栏功能时，要用于 控件中某个步骤的标题。

span.span: The title to use for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来显示中的一个步骤的用户友好标题控制启用侧栏功能时。Use the property to display a user-friendly title for a step in a control when the sidebar feature is enabled. 如果属性未设置和启用侧栏功能后，值属性显示为侧栏按钮。If the property is not set and the sidebar feature is enabled, the value of the property is displayed for the sidebar button. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用属性来显示中的一个步骤的用户友好标题控件。The following example demonstrates using the property to display a user-friendly title for a step in the control. 在示例中，`Step1`不具有其属性设置，使其显示在控件作为"WizardStep1"。In the example, `Step1` does not have its property set, so it appears in the control as "WizardStep1". `Step2` 确实有其设置属性，使其显示为"步骤 2"。`Step2` does have its property set, so it appears as "Step 2". [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle/CS/wizardstepbasetitlecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBaseTitle/VB/wizardstepbasetitlevb.aspx#1)]
